bike.description: S-Works E5 AEROTEC, fully manipulated tubing, compact track racing design, steel dropout protectors

components.description: Specialized FACT monocoque carbon fork; full carbon legs, crown and steerer

S-Works SL, FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, clear coat, owners manual
